```{r include=FALSE}
aarsData <- data.table::fread("C:/Users/feroc/MagentaCLOUD/MasterThesis/Powershell/aaRS.csv")
# delete fragments with less than 19 different amino acids
aarsData <- aarsData[which(aarsData$V1 >= 18)] 
aarsData <- aarsData[which(aarsData$V4 != "/uniprot/P46220" & aarsData$V4 != "/uniprot/Q50945" & aarsData$V4 != "/uniprot/P77984")]
```

Whole list: https://www.uniprot.org/docs/aatrnasy

Number of aaRSs, that are no fragments with less than 19 amino acids: `r nrow(aarsData)`

```{r echo=FALSE}
hist(aarsData$V1, col = c("yellow"), labels = TRUE, main = "Histogram of number of different aa per aaRS", ylim = c(0,12000), breaks = c(17.5,18.5,19.5,20.5), xlab = "Number of different amino acids", ylab = "Frequency of aaRSs",  xaxt='n')
axis(side=1, at=18:20, cex.axis=1) 
```
